attributes.action: Ban the practice of keeping animals as pets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no reason why any private person should be able to own another animal and impose their will on it. 

Purley private situations in mind, not relating to agriculture or working animals, I petition that the ability for people to own another living creature for their own pleasure should be banned.

In doing so, animal cruelty will be nulled and in this day and age where finite resources are a major concern, we will be helping to conserve our worlds resources to the areas which need it, not to a person's (often short term) whim of choosing to own an animal just because we are a higher being.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
